Sentencas: The double perovskite oxides are intriguing catalysts for energy conversion/storage and chemical sensor systems.
Titulo: The role of A-site cation size mismatch in tune the catalytic activity and durability of double perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The cation surface segregation is a stubborn issue that restricts their application.
Titulo: The role of A-site cation size mismatch in tune the catalytic activity and durability of double perovskite oxides

Sentencas: Herein, A-site cation size mismatch (MA) was proposed for the first time as a critical intrinsic parameter for controlling the surface chemistry and electrochemical performance of the double perovskite catalyst.
Titulo: The role of A-site cation size mismatch in tune the catalytic activity and durability of double perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The studies in PrBa1-xCaxCoCuO5+delta revealed that lowering MA can relieve lattice distortion, enlarge PrO delta layer space, maintain surface chemistry, and significantly improve catalytic activity and durability of the double perovskite.
Titulo: The role of A-site cation size mismatch in tune the catalytic activity and durability of double perovskite oxides

Sentencas: Specifically, as MA decrease from 26.1-18.1 %, the output peak power density of PrBa1-xCaxCoCuO5+delta-based single-cells increase from 1.47 to 2.04W cm(-2) (800 degrees C) while the output current density retentions rise from 82.2 to 94.7 % after 100 h (700 degrees C and 0.7 V).
Titulo: The role of A-site cation size mismatch in tune the catalytic activity and durability of double perovskite oxides

Sentencas: This guides the design of robust double perovskite catalysts in solid oxide cells, metal-air batteries, photocatalysis, and oxygen sensors.
Titulo: The role of A-site cation size mismatch in tune the catalytic activity and durability of double perovskite oxides
